thread.title: Loved this hotel, perfection location!
thread.title_full: Loved this hotel, perfection location! - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: stwelt
title: Loved this hotel, perfection location!
text: We loved this hotel that was recommended by our travel agent and our tour guide. The location was perfect, we walked everywhere! It is in a lively piazza but not too loud with lots of great restaurants within walking distance. The staff was extremely friendly and courteous. I would highly recommend this hotel and we can't wait to go back to Rome and stay here again.
